item.title: Bitcoin hits new high, Solana price jumps as memecoins mania rises and Worldcoin faces heat in Spain
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。
本文介绍了TechCrunch Crypto最新的动态，前身是Chain Reaction。文章总结了加密货币领域过去一个周的重要事件。

Welcome to TechCrunch Crypto, formerly known as Chain Reaction -- it was an eventful week in the crypto world.

item.title: Bitcoin hits new all-time high of $72,700 but one index warns we’re in ‘extreme greed’ territory
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。加密货币市场继续保持火热状态，比特币不断创下新高，周一超过了72700美元。这一情况最初是由现货比特币ETF的批准驱动的，在即将到来的“减半”事件之前，将限制新供应量的投放流通。TechCrunch（2024年）

The crypto scene continues to remain so hot that bitcoin is hitting one new high after another. It surpassed $72,700 on Monday. This was initially driven by the approval of spot bitcoin ETFs, but is now being pushed higher ahead of a “halving” event, which will limit the amount of new supply put into circulation […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Bitcoin hits highs, Binance launches a crypto perfume and Coachella partners with OpenSea
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。本文介绍了TechCrunch Crypto上的一周重要事件。首先，比特币价格创下新高，引起人们的关注。接着，西班牙数据保护机构禁止了Worldcoin的使用。最后，Binance推出了香水产品，引起人们的疑虑。

Welcome back to TechCrunch Crypto. It was an eventful week: bitcoin’s price hit a new high, Spain’s data protection authority banned Worldcoin and Binance raised eyebrows after making perfume.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Bitcoin hits new all-time high passing $69,000 for first time since November 2021
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。本文报道了比特币在2023年达到了新的历史最高点，首次突破高点超过$69,000。这一涨势主要归因于近几周的需求增长，尤其是在通过了现货比特币ETF批准后。这标志着比特币今年以来表现活跃，尽管仅仅是三月。TechCrunch预计比特币将继续受到关注，并保持强劲的增长。

It’s been a busy year so far for bitcoin, the largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, and it’s only March. The digital currency hit a new all-time high for the first time since November 2021 when it passed $69,000 on Tuesday morning, as demand surged in recent weeks following the spot bitcoin ETF approvals in the […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Bitcoin jumped and Coinbase’s app crashed, while Aptos eyes Hong Kong and Telegram rolls out rewards with TON
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。本周最大的新闻包括比特币价格飙升和Coinbase的应用程序崩溃，电报推出了使用toncoin支付奖励的计划等。TechCrunch Crypto是版权所有的，仅限个人使用。

Welcome to TechCrunch Crypto. Here’s the biggest news this week: bitcoin’s price jumped and Coinbase’s app crashed, Telegram rolled out a plan to pay out rewards using toncoin and more.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Asymmetric Financial has a plan to unlock Bitcoin’s trillion-dollar potential with dedicated DeFi fund
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。数字资产行业再次蓬勃发展，一些加密货币基金正在聚焦特定领域。Asymmetric Financial加密基金正在创建Bitcoin DeFi Venture Fund I，专注于投资区块链新兴领域，目标筹资为2100万美元。该基金将由总经理领导。TechCrunch报道。

As the digital asset industry picks up steam again, some crypto funds are looking to home in on specific sectors. Crypto fund Asymmetric Financial is creating its Bitcoin DeFi Venture Fund I to focus on investing in the blockchain’s nascent space with a target raise of $21 million. The fund will be spearheaded by general […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: As spot bitcoin ETF volumes continue to rise, Bitwise Asset Management predicts a high ceiling for growth
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。Bitwise运营着Bitwise比特币ETP，目前是市值第四大的现货比特币ETF。然而，走到这一点的道路并不容易。TechCrunch网络2024年的报道记述了Bitwise在市场上的地位，揭示了他们取得成功的艰辛过程。

Bitwise runs the Bitwise Bitcoin ETP, currently the fourth-largest spot bitcoin ETF by market cap. But the road to this point wasn’t easy.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How low can bitcoin ETF fees drop before it hurts a business?
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。在批准的发行人中，一些公司正在采取额外措施，以确保他们的产品在众多产品中脱颖而出。这些额外的步骤可能包括增加产品功能、提供更好的用户体验或提供更具吸引力的设计。这些努力可能有助于吸引更多的消费者，并赢得市场份额。

Some of the approved issuers are taking extra steps to ensure that their product stands out from the pack.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Hestiia wants you to mine for crypto to heat your house
item.content:encoded:
摘要: 这些信息是积极的。文章指出加密挖矿消耗大量能源，比特币单独消耗127太瓦时每年。如果比特币是一个国家，它将排在世界上第32大电力消费国的位置。大部分能源被释放为热量，需要冷却。

It’s not news that crypto mining takes a lot of energy. Bitcoin alone is estimated to consume 127 terawatt-hours a year. If Bitcoin was a country, it would slot in roughly as the 32nd biggest consumer of electricity in the world. A lot of this energy is output as heat, which needs to be cooled […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Grayscale CEO sees spot bitcoin ETF as first step toward ‘normalizing’ crypto
item.content:encoded:
摘要：

这些信息是积极的。美国证券交易委员会终于批准了所有11家提出的现货比特币ETF申请，经历了漫长的道路。Grayscale Investments的首席执行官Michael Sonnenshein在TechCrunch的Chain Reaction播客上表示，他已经预料到这一天将会到来。自从10年前就一直知道这一点。投资者情绪一直都在支持这一决定。

It’s been a long road for spot bitcoin ETF filers — and today the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission finally approved all 11 standing applications from issuers. “I’ve known for 10 years that this was going to happen,” Michael Sonnenshein, CEO of Grayscale Investments, said on TechCrunch’s Chain Reaction podcast. “We always knew the investor sentiment […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: US approves first spot bitcoin ETF applications for 11 issuers
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章介绍了自第一份比特币现货ETF申请以来已经过去了十多年的历程。美国证券交易委员会已批准了来自11家比特币现货ETF发行人的所有申请，这标志着加密行业潜在的分水岭时刻，可能会打开大门让更多ETF进入市场。

It’s been over a decade since the first application for a spot bitcoin ETF was filed. After a number of denials over the years, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has approved all 11 applications from spot bitcoin ETF issuers, marking a potential watershed moment for the crypto industry and potentially opening the floodgates by […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: SEC’s X account hacked, sharing ‘unauthorized tweet’ regarding spot bitcoin ETF
item.content:encoded:
摘要： 这些信息是消极的。根据TechCrunch的报道，美国证券交易委员会的Twitter账户已被黑客攻击。一位发言人证实账户被入侵，未经授权发布有关比特币ETF的推文并澄清该推文并非由SEC或其工作人员发布。这是一个安全漏洞的例子，表明金融机构仍然容易受到网络攻击的影响。

The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s X account has been hacked, a spokesperson confirmed with TechCrunch on Tuesday afternoon. “The SEC’s @SECGov X/Twitter account has been compromised. The unauthorized tweet regarding bitcoin ETFs was not made by the SEC or its staff,” the spokesperson said. A similar statement was shared shortly after on the media […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Valkyrie co-founder expects $10B inflows for spot bitcoin ETFs by end of year
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。本文采访了Valkyrie的联合创始人，谈论了他认为期货比特币 ETF 将会消失的原因，哪些现货加密货币 ETF 可能会接替，以及为什么费用之争“荒谬”。

We sat down with Valkyrie's co-founder to chat about why he thinks futures bitcoin ETFs will go away, which spot crypto ETFs could come next, and why the fee wars are “ridiculous.”

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Arkon Energy raises $110M to grow US bitcoin mining capacity, launch AI cloud service in Norway
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。根据计划，公司将在俄亥俄州、北卡罗来纳州和得克萨斯州建造新的数据中心，总共耗资约8000万美元。该计划旨在到2024年中期将公司的总兆瓦数增加130%。

About $80 million will be used to build new data centers in Ohio, North Carolina and Texas as part of a plan to increase the company’s total megawatts by 130% by mid-2024.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Lolli raises $8M Series B to expand its bitcoin and cashback rewards to enterprises
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。Lolli是一款比特币和返现奖励应用程序，已经成功筹集了800万美元的B轮融资。这笔资金将用于扩大该应用程序的影响力和增加用户基础。这表明投资者对Lolli的前景感到乐观，并相信其在加密货币和奖励市场上具有巨大潜力。

Lolli, a bitcoin and cashback rewards application, has raised an $8 million Series B round, TechCrunch has exclusively learned.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Bitcoin ATM company Coin Cloud got hacked. Even its new owners don’t know how.
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是消极的。2024年11月，网络安全团体vx-underground在X（以前的Twitter）上表示，不明身份的黑客声称已侵入了破产的比特币ATM公司Coin Cloud。据vx-underground称，黑客声称已窃取了从ATM内嵌摄像头中拍摄的70000张客户照片，以及30万名客户的个人数据。TechCrunch未提供更多细节，但该事件可能导致用户个人信息遭到泄露和滥用。

In November, the cybersecurity collective vx-underground wrote on X, formerly Twitter, that unknown hackers were claiming to have breached Coin Cloud, a bankrupt Bitcoin ATM company. According to vx-underground, the hackers claimed to have stolen 70,000 pictures of customers taken from cameras embedded in the ATMs, as well as the personal data of 300,000 customers, […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Bitcoin continues climbing, Block releases hardware wallet, Robinhood expands to EU and VCs may see some relief soon
item.content:encoded:
摘要: 这些信息是积极的。
加密市场总市值在过去一周稳步增长14％，随着更多资金进入该市场。TechCrunch报道的数据显示了加密市场的积极发展趋势。

Welcome back to Chain Reaction. In general, the total crypto market cap steadily rose 14% in the past week as more capital enters the crypto market.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: As Bitcoin reaches the $44,000 threshold, why the surge and what’s next?
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。比特币的价格在年底时出现了激增，伴随着自2022年11月以来最高的交易量。

Bitcoin’s price surge into year-end has been exceptionally encouraging, as it has been accompanied by the highest trading volume it has seen since November 2022.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How Jane Street-backed ZetaChain aims to expand Bitcoin’s use cases
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章提到比特币在加密货币领域占据主导地位，但在应用方面受限，与其他区块链相比，它的应用范围有限。以太坊作为一个例子，每月有近6000名开发人员在其网络上积极构建，这表明其在金融产品到视频游戏等领域为资产转移提供了丰富的应用场景。

Despite its dominant market share in the crypto sphere, Bitcoin has had limited applications compared to other blockchains which have blossomed to facilitate asset transfers in everything from financial products to video games. Ethereum, for example, has close to 6,000 developers actively building on its network every month as of October 1, according to numbers […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Taproot Wizards raises $7.5M for its Ordinals project to bring the ‘magic’ back to Bitcoin
item.content:encoded:
摘要： 这些信息是积极的。《TechCrunch》报道了一个名为Taproot Wizards的比特币项目，旨在改变人们对区块链的看法。该项目着眼于改变区块链的认知，并专注于比特币。这一举措可能对加密货币行业产生积极影响，可能引领行业发展新方向。TechCrunch认为这个项目有潜力影响行业格局，值得密切关注。

Taproot Wizards, a Bitcoin-focused Ordinals project, is trying to change the way the blockchain is perceived.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.
